references.paper_title: Differentiable vector graphics rasterization for editing and learning
references.reason: This paper introduces a differentiable rendering method for vectorization, a core technique used in LayerTracer's layer-wise vectorization module.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-resolution image synthesis method using latent diffusion models, which is the foundation of LayerTracer's diffusion transformer architecture.
This paper introduces scalable diffusion models with transformers, providing LayerTracer with an efficient and scalable architecture for generating layered SVGs.

references.paper_title: Vectorfusion: Text-to-svg by abstracting pixel-based diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for generating SVGs from text prompts by abstracting pixel-based diffusion models, a technique relevant to LayerTracer's text-to-SVG generation capability.
This paper focuses on layer-wise image vectorization, which is directly relevant to LayerTracer's approach of generating layered SVGs by modeling the layer-by-layer creation process.
